name: com.fuzzphyte.utility.analytics
description: FP Analytics is a set of simple statistics that can be used for simple game/event stats. It contains calculators to allow you to combine results from events. You will need to also make sure you have added the https://github.com/JShull/FP_Utility.git to your Unity package manager as a git url.

samples.description: Includes some examples of the different scriptable object based stat events. Please make sure you have TextMeshPro already added in to Unitys Package Manager

Includes an example on linking analytics to a Google Firebase project. This requires the Firebase SDK to be installed in your project. Please go to https://developers.google.com/unity/archive#firebase for more information.
